Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 93rd/Marquette
ShortDescription: EB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony & 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony and resume their normal route on 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

Shuttles buss are available form Forest Park to UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
